# CSS Positioning ðŸ“

The `position` property specifies the type of positioning method used for an element.

## Static (Default)
Normal flow. `top`, `bottom`, `left`, `right` have no effect.

## Relative
Positioned relative to its **normal position**.
```css
.box {
  position: relative;
  left: 20px; /* Moves 20px from where it SHOULD be */
  top: 10px;
}
```
Leaves a gap where it used to be.
